description: Requirement for a bulk oxygen (O2) delivery system in support of the high pressure research facility for 5 years.
tags: Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### **Bulk Oxygen (O2) Delivery System Procurement - Ottawa**

**Contract Number:** WS4229824175
**Reference Number:** WS4229824175-Doc4262871143
**Publication Date:** October 17, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** November 17, 2023, 2:00 PM (EDT)

**Procurement Opportunity:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to provide a bulk oxygen (O2) delivery system for the Department of Natural Resources (NRCan) at the high-pressure research facility in Ottawa.

**Contract Details:**

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Contract Terms:** 5 years (2023-2028)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Ottawa, Ontario
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contracting Entity Information:**
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
* Contact Person: Nicole Zimmerling (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [nicole.zimmerling@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nicole.zimmerling@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice and Attachment:**
This notice and any attachments are available for download at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17740951?extsite=MTc3NDA5NTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**All submissions and inquiries should be directed to:**
Nicole Zimmerling (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [nicole.zimmerling@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nicole.zimmerling@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) We've extracted the relevant information into several categories to ensure that all necessary details are included in the rewritten entry. The new format is more professional, concise, and easy to follow. Let me know if you need any further modifications!
